title: [HOLD for payment 2023-09-27] [$500] Web - The amount of money is displayed inaccurately
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. In the workspace -> create a new request for money
2. Click on Distance tab, choose the address for start and finish position -> press Next button
3.. As you can the distance is 3.08 Km and the amount is $307,888.00

Expected result: With 3.08 km, the amount has to be $308,000 because I set up $100000 per km.

Actual result: None
